data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Jawa Tengah words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Jawa Tengah, Indonesia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Please, convict the 1,093,654 believers in Jawa Tengah, Indonesia to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Jawa Tengah, Indonesia to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Jawa Tengah, Indonesia into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Jew, Indonesian-speaking people. Make the Jew, Indonesian-speaking people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Jawa Tengah hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Jawa Tengah to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Jawa Tengah.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

location.name: Jawa Tengah
location.people_groups_list: Java Banyumasan, Java Pesisir Kulon, Java Pesisir Lor, Indonesian
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Java Banyumasan (9,140,000), Java Pesisir Kulon (5,151,000), Java Pesisir Lor (37,187,000), Indonesian (8,242,000)
